nodes.text: Galpos II was a desolate planet in the Abrion sector of the Outer Rim Territories. It was suspected to be a base for pirate groups operating in the sector. The pirate vessel GrimDeath I was once tracked traveling to the world.

Galpos II's entry in The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia placed the planet in the Woldona system. However, the publication of the Star Wars: The Essential Atlas Online Companion places the Galpos and Woldona systems in different sectors.
